description:
Don't Break It: Continuous Integration & Deployment

Presented by Benno Rice

So you've developed your application, it appears to work and you may
even have some tests to back that up. Now what?

One part of software development that tends to receive not nearly enough
attention is the process of deploying, supporting and maintaining your
code in production. This demonstration will give an overview of using
tools such as Hudson, nose, stdeb and freshen to automate the testing,
packaging, deployment and verification of production software.
title: PyConAU 2010: Don't Break It: Continuous Integration & Deployment
